text: Klyanus'! K vam prishol Yusuf do Musy s yasnymi znameniyami, no vy prodolzhali somnevat'sya v tom, s chem on prishol, a kogda on skonchalsya, vy skazali, chto Allakh ne poshlot drugogo poslannika posle Yusufa. Tak Allakh vvodit v glubokoye zabluzhdeniye prestupayushchikh predely, somnevayushchikhsya
